commit message: Try to adjust the font size a little bit again in block schedules.
BlockSchedule range checking bugfix, and reasonable <API11 code for zoom.

Patch for 0.999.999-gb release. I'd prefer to forget about <ICS from now on.
In case I fix some more serious bugs, I hope this patch will still let me do
another Gingerbread-compatible release.

Lower minimum TentHeight in block schedule to something more sensible for
low-dpi devices. Really I should just use dp's..

Yes, the problem with a separate activity for the event 'dialog' is you might
miss some data when resuming a few hours later. Just send the user back to
the schedule viewer in those cases.

Schedule parser improvements: Remove HTML tags from description, and scan it
for URLs. Also, trim spurious whitespace in a few places, which caused ugly
rendering.

Make widget resizable (and remove fixed width setting from its layout
definition). For some reason on my N7 if I add the widget while in portrait
mode, it gets only 3 blocks instead of 4. It can be adjusted now (even to
>4 wide on bigger screens).
Bugfix: String.match does a full match.
